channel.title: (317)Combat Level Help(317)
channel.description: Hi there, I have 2 questions... First off, how can i make my maximum combat level 138 (Somewhere i read that i have to make another skill a combat skill). Secondly, I was curious about how i would make admins+ be able to have a higher combat level than normal players, If you [b]can[/b] help I will be very grateful! PS: I have already tried changing the maximum skill level but i much prefer having a "normal" skill level as in 99 or 100. Hope you can help!

item.title: (317)Combat Level Help(317)
item.dc:creator: @bladex_demon bladex demon
item.description:
@bladex_demon wrote:

Hi there, I have 2 questions… First off, how can i make my maximum combat level 138 (Somewhere i read that i have to make another skill a combat skill). Secondly, I was curious about how i would make admins+ be able to have a higher combat level than normal players, If you can help I will be very grateful!
PS: I have already tried changing the maximum skill level but i much prefer having a “normal” skill level as in 99 or 100.
Hope you can help!
